name: accessibility-checker
description: Audit and check your website for accessibility before you hit publish. In-post accessibility scanner and guidance.
author: Equalize Digital

scripts.build: composer install && npm install && npx webpack
scripts.dist: mkdir -p ./dist && npm install && npx webpack --mode production && composer install --no-dev && composer dump-autoload --no-dev && wp-scripts plugin-zip && mv accessibility-checker.zip ./dist && composer install
